#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#define getx getchar_unlocked
#define putx putchar_unlocked
inline int readn()
{
    char c;
    int x=0;
    c=getx();
    while (c<=' ') c=getx();
    while (c>='0')
    {
        x=10*x+(c-'0');
        c=getx();
    }
    return x;
}

inline void printn(int x)
{
    char str[16];
    int i=0;
    if (x==0) putx('0');
    else
    {
        while (x>0)
        {
            str[i++]=(x%10)+'0';
            x=x/10;
        }
        while(i)
        {
            putx(str[--i]);
        }
    }
}

#define ll long long
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ll a[100010],i,n,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        n=readn();
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            a[i]=readn();
            
        a[0]=0;
        
        sort(a+1,a+n+1);
        
        if(n<=1)
        {
            cout<<"YES\n";
            continue;
        }
        
        ll sum=0;
        
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]<=sum+1)
                sum+=a[i];
            else
                break;
        }
        
        if(i==n+1)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
